tweet: As I promised yesterday, I came back with a new image, this time about #Cardano and it's ecosystem.  The high resolution wallpaper is available for free on our website.  https://t.co/EJgCLL7Mu5 ✌  #CHARM #ADA @IOHK_Charles @BlenderArtists @BlenderNation @blender_org  https://t.co/zgKH8iuaz6

On Monday February 24th (for some already Tue. the 25th) Charles Hoskinson sat down for another update on the recent progress with #Cardano. There he discussed key upcoming milestones on the road to the launch of #Shelley #mainnet.  https://t.co/Xf3NVKkxXs #CardanoCommunity

Charles Hoskinson said after the PwC workshop in March, he would be going to Tanzania where #Cardano is close to sealing a deal with a telecom company in the country.  The Shelley test-net should be out hopefully by March.   https://t.co/SdXJzScQSS  #crypto #blockchain $ADA $BTC
Hoskinson: Delegation will pitch Cardano to Fortune 500 companies  https://t.co/l8qZYwwJvk
The market is falling again, but the #Cardano team is still working hard.  A new commit is added nearly every ten minutes.   https://t.co/W9aa1SH8KP  $ADA #crypto #blockchain

😏 8-year old me would be pissed off at This Me. I work for a bank, indoors, in an office. I'm not an astronaut, not saving lives, not a hockey player 🏒  I'm glad I found #crypto. Let's moon in 2020 so I can quit & do what I truly love 🙏  $VET $XRP $ADA $XTZ $ICX $HBAR $AGI

"The best part of my day is when I have a chance to chat with my product managers about our progress, new ideas, and what’s coming to market soon. #Cardano is like an iceberg. It is so much you don’t see, but will soon have a huge impact."  Charles Hoskinson  $ADA #blockchain
